name: Advance java(Spring)
title: Online Flowers Shop
detaile: Online flower shop is the name of my project. This project was designed through spring framework(no-XML) java. There are two types of users in this project and they are Admin and Customers. My contribution was in writing the complete code for the website.

name: Advance .Net (ASP.NET)
title: Online Medicine Service
detaile: Online Medicine Service is the name of my project. This project was designed through ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET web API, and React JS. There are four types of users in this project they are Admin, Staff, Customers, and Delivery man. My contribution was in writing the complete ASP.NET MVC, backend(ASP.NET web API(SOLID and 3 tier app)), and frontend(react js) code for the Customers part of the website.

name: Computer Graphics
title: Beautiful Village Scenario
detaile: There are so many components and parts in our project. Like uses of geometric primitives,translation,rotation, scaling, animation, handle key press, handle mouse types of mode etc.All these parts are drawn in window using OpenGL. As the code writing part of the project is quite lengthy, there are some problematic part too. In our project, A Beautiful Village Scenario which is simple, good looking village.
